column2: we sat down and the waiter came over soon afterwards. He was a nice guy but it was kind of irritating communicating with him because of the nature of the tables - he was basically standing behind me so I had to crane my neck to see him. He explained the menu to us and recommended we try the 6 course tasting
column3: which ended up being about ~$45 a person. We thought this sounded nice so we went with it. I will say that the waiter did an OK job throughout the meal but felt a bit absent. I finished my beer really early on and he never asked me if I wanted another one
column4: whereas he asked my wife if she wanted another cocktail. And just in general
column5: it didn't really feel like he was paying too much attention to us. Granted
column7: but you don't really want to feel that way regardless :)
